Author: medalex
Title: [ANN] LITRA Coin: Welcome to the Future of Healthcare ★★★★★ PRE-SALE OPEN
Body: The project itself looks quite interesting. However there are some questions. Do you already have some certain plan involving healthcare providers who is the owner of EHR now? In the web site you mentioned that for them it is free. According to my 10+ years of experience it is really hard for healthcare provider to change its own internal processes and invest in the interchangeability solutions. This does not make the integration with your system free but brings lots of new effort that healthcare provider usually does not want to take. From your whitepaper it is not 100% clear what is the reason for the blockchain usage and how this technology solves the interoperability problems in eHealth that is a really big problem now?  Answering these question is essential in my opinion as they cover main nowadays problems in the healthcare data integration domain.

Author: MuAm
Title: [ANN] LITRA Coin: Welcome to the Future of Healthcare ★★★★★ PRE-SALE OPEN
Body: Litra blockchain works as connector between all existing EHR systems, that hospitals invested a lot in, and it will not replace easily, we will provide all solutions to get it up to date to our Free EHR users platform, this starts from API, to other solutions, include having some of that data on our  free HIPPA Certified cloud datacenter to healthcare institutions.  We are not providing a replace data storage services! All healthcare institutions have more than enough storage, but their EHR/EMR systems don't communicate with each others, and that's what we will offer cost free for them. This is one of the multi services we will offer, it will including disrupting pharmaceutical advertising market, and how they reach to physics.   On the white paper we did mention how it works on basic level as: " The data itself can be deposited anywhere while the blockchain store the links to EHR updates. All updates associated with any individual health record can be curated within individual blocks and published on the Litra blockchain."  No one will give their "data" for free, but when it comes to access other "data", and organize plus saving time and money, they will all join in! more important we are starting with the patient, as it is his right to access his EHR anytime anywhere not by requesting 100+ pages by mail!  We are far away from PTOY. Its like someone thinking about riding a bus, and another building Tesla! We are building Tesla! Think owing Litra now as someone who had a chance to own couple hundreds of Tesla stocks early days*  Thank you. Mu,  * Clarification: Litra is a coin not a security.

Author: MuAm
Title: [ANN] LITRA Coin: Welcome to the Future of Healthcare ★★★★★ PRE-SALE OPEN
Body: Of course, we want to show you that you can be invisible!!! As Banksy says "I don't know why people are so keen to put the details of their private life in public, they forget that invisibility is a superpower"  But jokes aside, we actually was not planning for an ICO, so we started a year ago deleting our data.. As a challenge if can we do it? or not? without paying and can this improve our efficiency? We didn't it took 8-10 months! But 2 weeks ago when we decided to go with ICO, we found out how important social proof is for most of you here?! LinkedIn is not important and no other social account has any value of building a startup!  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2132770.msg21317283#msg21317283  I am going to publish a post, and I will answer all your questions later on today, but answer me why would you and I allow all these companies to keep making money from us, while we don't have access to our health records? Does make sense?  But for me you can tweet me @amous Thats the only account I kept online! I have few connection I like to stay in touch with via twitter dming.

Author: MuAm
Title: [ANN] LITRA Coin: Welcome to the Future of Healthcare ★★★★★ PRE-SALE OPEN
Body: No! You cant do that with the regulations (HIPAA & HITRUST)! This would be none Healthcare amateur who would suggest something like this. In our Whitepaper we did layout how it will work (Page 15):  "Litra blockchain can provide additional accountability and transparency to the healthcare industry. The data itself can be deposited anywhere while the blockchain store the links to EHR updates. All updates associated with any individual health record can be curated within individual blocks and published on the Litra blockchain."  You already have it on many hospitals servers, and these servers are there! Litra Blockchain will talk to each server and let the information flows, we will have our own datacenter on a later stage.

Author: MuAm
Title: [ANN] LITRA Coin: Welcome to the Future of Healthcare ★★★★★ PRE-SALE OPEN
Body: Thank you! But that project approach is far away from what we are doing here! We are building the structure. We are building ‘utility’ that would become essential to healthcare.  We have innovative revenue models, better business models.  Litra Blockchain is all about life, Litra Blockchain is all about enjoying life.   Mu,

Author: MuAm
Title: [ANN] LITRA Coin: Welcome to the Future of Healthcare ★★★★★ PRE-SALE OPEN
Body: I think you didn't read my first post here! So here it is again:  "Hello everyone, I'm Mu - the founder of Litra . Just opened an account on Bitcointalk to answer all the questions you may have regarding our company and the token sale.  Litra is created using Litecoin Blockchain, because Litra will be the blockchain of health records, speed and faster excuse is one the benefits of using the blockchain in first place.  We at Litra believe if a currency is to thrive in the long term, it must be backed by a scarce resource. Scarcity has the property that it is not evenly distributed. If it was, it wouldn’t be scarce in the first place, that's what make Litra different than other cryptocurrencies.  At Litra we are helping people live better, we are giving them back their "time" lives because they don’t have to deal with complex solutions ... Our mission is to help people live better lives through better healthcare.  Litra is here to create uncontested new market space that make the competition irrelevant in $5.5 trillion healthcare market.  Litra does not need to match any other coin symmetrically, Litra is something new!  An investment that make positive real impact on people lives...You will be proud to be an early Litra owner."

Body: Okay, I just checked the website for a good couple of seconds and it doesn’t look like there’s much work that went on for that site. You guys are doing an Ico for this project is nice, yet there is no real work done on the main website for this coin. The website design could be completed within a day really easily, I am not so sure what the money is going to be used for because you guys look like you’re being frugal with the money that you already have.  97% of the images on your website appeared to be reused and stretched, that is a bad vibe for people that want to invest in something.

Body: Yes, mass distribution with estimation of 20 million wallets, each will contain minimum 1 coin, up to 10 depends on family members. Why SEC is not problem? Because we are not selling nor this is a security like Ether token! As we mentioned on our Whitepaper, our blockchain is based on Litecoin blockchain.  Plus our legal advisor is keeping up to date with any information, so it will be consider as you sign up to an app, and they give you 1 Euro  Litra does not need to match other cryptocurrencies symmetrically!
